text:
Granular | System Enginers, Platform Software Engineers | Full Time | San Francisco, CA | Onsite

Granularâ€™s mission is to transform the business of farming. We are building out our Systems Engineering / Platform team to meet our scalability, performance, data ingestion pipeline and future product needs. Our tech stack is mainly: Python, Django, Pyramid, Angular, AWS, Postgres and a bunch of other related technologies.

Granular was recently acquired by DowDuPont. Looking for people well versed on the above (or willing to learn). Looking for folks with 3-5 years of experience. If this sounds interesting, please reach out to me directly: jimmyjohn [@] granular.ag

Unfortunately, we cannot sponsor H1B visas at this time.
